https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null To be there is not to be here, is to be nowhere. Time, physical locations and distance. The foreigner is absent from himself. The author is the foreigner of foreigners. "I'm looking for a man I don't know, who's never been more myself since I started looking for him." Edmond Jabes Desertum
